response.original_title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
response.overview: The Dwarves, Bilbo and Gandalf have successfully escaped the Misty Mountains, and Bilbo has gained the One Ring. They all continue their journey to get their gold back from the Dragon, Smaug.
response.tagline: Beyond darkness... beyond desolation... lies the greatest danger of all.
response.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
